sentences.english: I was her, she was me, we were young, we were free.

sentences.english: Do you just regard me as your friend after these years of intimacy?

sentences.english: Couldn't we just be friends after these years of intimacy?
sentences.chinese: 那这些年的专心无猜，当朋友都不好吗？
